biography.content: Thiago A. S. Pardo received his Computer Science degree (1999) and MSc degree (2002) from the Federal University of São Carlos (UFSCar), and the PhD degree (2005) from the University of São Paulo (USP), in Brazil, where he has also done his post-doctorate (2005). Since 2006, he has been a Full-Time Professor and Researcher at USP.
